alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 21 at 9:50PM MST until August 22 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of South Central Arizona, including the following county, Pima. * WHEN...Until 100 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 950 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Daniels Arroyo, Alamo Wash, Tenmile Wash, Rio Cornez Wash, Cuerda de Lena, Growler Wash, Gu Vo Wash, Kuakatch Wash, Ali Chuk Wash, Aguajita Wash, Pia Oik Wash, Gibson Arroyo, Siovi Shuatak Wash, Gunsight Wash and Sikort Chuapo Wash. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, Why, Charco 27, Gunsight, Kuakatch and Lukeville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
